content.title: Intro
content.content: -ielde is a feminine suffix in Quenya.[1] An example would be Elerondielde ("Daughter of Elrond"), which is another name for Arwen.[2]

content.title: References
content.content:
↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, "Words, Phrases and Passages in Various Tongues in The Lord of the Rings: Eldarin Roots and Stems", in Parma Eldalamberon XVII (edited by Christopher Gilson), p.170
